title: Experience-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of high school-level foundational mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment applying mathematical approaches to real-world problem-solving scenarios faced by professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can translate real-world problems encountered in professional work environments into mathematical models.
Learners design problem-solving strategies by utilizing diverse learning patterns (case analysis, simulation, reflective journaling).
Learners demonstrate effective decision-making skills through project deliverables that incorporate peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
